lead_paragraph: The Celtics’ 3-0 N.B.A. series lead has dwindled to 3-2 and is looking about as safe as the Bruins’ 3-0 lead did over the Flyers in the N.H.L. playoffs.
snippet: The Celtics’ 3-0 N.B.A. series lead has dwindled to 3-2 and is looking about as safe as the Bruins’ 3-0 lead did over the Flyers in the N.H.L. playoffs.
